metadata.title: CVE-2023-32200 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: There is insufficient restrictions of called script functions in Apache Jena versions 4.8.0 and earlier. It allows a remote user to execute javascript via a SPARQL query. This issue affects Apache Jena: from 3.7.0 through 4.8.0.

criterions.comment: apache-jena package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
